description:
GateGuru is a “Top 5 Air Travel App” - CNN!  
Winner of numerous awards for Best Travel or Airport app!  
And now, a TripAdvisor Company!

OVERVIEW
Introducing GateGuru 4.0 – the ONLY travel app that provides all of the flight and airport information you need to manage your ENTIRE day-of travel. Now with a new gorgeous, seamless, and traveler centric design!  

GateGuru is the only travel app (free or paid) that provides real-time flight status with push notifications along with a wealth of airport content specifically customized to YOUR itinerary. 

And now, users can reserve last-minute airport rental cars at significantly discounted rates that are exclusive only through GateGuru! 

GateGuru brings back what the day-of travel was supposed to be – efficient, relaxing and even fun. Download now and see the difference! 

USE GATEGURU HOW YOU WANT TO  
-Looking for something airport specific – Search by Airport.  
-Want GateGuru to provide real-time flight status info, push notifications as well as all of the airport content (customized based on your itinerary) – add a flight! 

AWARDS AND PRESS HIGHLIGHTS
- Featured by Apple in a national television commercial and print campaign 
- Winner of numerous related awards for Best Travel App 
- Recommended on The Today Show, NY Times, WSJ, USAToday and many more! 
 
OWN YOUR DAY-OF TRAVEL - LEVERAGE THE FULL GATEGURU FUNCTIONALITY
To get started, add your itinerary to GateGuru (easiest way is to email it to plans@gateguruapp.com). 

Once you input your itinerary, GateGuru does the rest!  We automatically connect the dots for every part of your day-of travel experience.  Some of the relevant information that GateGuru provides a traveler: 
- Check-in airport terminal 
- Airport weather 
- Terminal and gate arrival and departure information 
- Real time flight status with push notifications for changes and updates 
- Estimated TSA security wait times for your checkpoints 
- Airport food and amenity information (with over 35,000 ratings and reviews), customized to your arrival and departure terminal 
- Airport maps and tips to help you navigate an unfamiliar airport 
- Last minute rental car bookings with substantial savings 

Connect with us: 
Email: support@gateguruapp.com 
Twitter: www.twitter.com/gateguruapp 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/gateguruapp
releaseNotes:
- New functionality: Flight Board!  View all of the departing and arriving flights for thousands of worldwide airports
- Better communication for airports where we have limited data
- In-app airport requests 
- Various user experience and design improvements
- More flexibility around how you connect your Tripit account
- Bug and crash fixes
- "GateGuru, a TripAdvisor company" header
